properties.name: graphdb.path
properties.description: The directory to store the data of Neo4j in.

properties.name: graphdb.config
properties.description: The location of the Neo4j configuration. Settings in this file are overwriting the bootstrap configuration.

properties.name: graphdb.bootstrap-config
properties.description: The location of the bootstrap Neo4j configuration. Settings in this file are overwritten by the regular configuration.

properties.name: graphdb.port
properties.description: The port the Neo4j browser should run on.

properties.name: wikidb.driver-class
properties.description: The class of the JDBC driver to use to connect to the wiki database.

properties.name: wikidb.username
properties.description: The username to use to connect to the wiki database.

properties.name: wikidb.password
properties.description: The password to use to connect to the wiki database.

properties.name: wikidb.url
properties.description: The JDBC URL of the wiki database.

properties.name: wikidb.prefix
properties.description: The prefix in front of the tables of the wiki database.
